name: es6.tmlanguage
description: Better JavaScript language definition for TextMate and SublimeText. This builds on the language files commonly used and adds more fine grained matching and also includes new features from ECMAScript 6 like modules, succinct methods, arrow functions, classes, generators, and accessors (ES5).
author: LestaD <i.am@lestad.net> (Sergey Sova)
